languages.text: Nazrakhei grants his ally (allies with obey my authority have highest priority) an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}. The creature which gained that extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} tries to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the enemy who {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} Nazrakhei.
languages.original_text: Назракей предоставляет союзнику {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} (в приоритете союзники, на которых действует "Немедленно подчиниться!") Существо, получившее дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, пытается атаковать противника, который нанес {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} Назракею.

traits.locale_text: Nazrakhei grants his ally (allies with obey my authority have highest priority) an extra turn. The creature which gained that extra turn tries to hit the enemy who damaged Nazrakhei.

Nazrakhei grants his ally (allies with obey my authority have highest priority) an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}. The creature which gained that extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} tries to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the enemy who {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} Nazrakhei.

Nazrakhei grants his ally (allies with obey my authority have highest priority) an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}. The creature which gained that extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} tries to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the enemy who {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} Nazrakhei.

languages.text: Nazrakhei concede a un aliado (tienen preferencia los aliados afectados por ¡Acatad mi autoridad!) un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g}. La criatura que recibe el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} extra intentará {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactar{/g} al enemigo que ha infligido {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a Nazrakhei.
languages.original_text: Nazrakhei grants his ally (allies with obey my authority have highest priority) an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}. The creature which gained that extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} tries to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the enemy who {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} Nazrakhei.

traits.locale_text: Nazrakhei concede a un aliado (tienen preferencia los aliados afectados por ¡Acatad mi autoridad!) un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g}. La criatura que recibe el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} extra intentará atacar al enemigo que ha herido a Nazrakhei.{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}{/g}

languages.text: 纳札骸赐予他的盟友一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，受到“服从于我”影响的盟友会被优先选择。获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}的生物会试图攻击{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}纳札骸的敌人。
languages.original_text: Nazrakhei grants his ally (allies with obey my authority have highest priority) an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}. The creature which gained that extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} tries to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the enemy who {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} Nazrakhei.

traits.locale_text: 纳札骸赐予他的盟友一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，受到“服从于我”影响的盟友会被优先选择。获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}的生物会试图攻击伤害纳札骸的敌人。{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}{/g}

languages.text: Nazrakhei confère un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} à son allié (les alliés sous l'effet d'Obéissez-moi ! sont prioritaires). La créature ayant bénéficié de ce {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} supplémentaire essaie de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}toucher{/g} l'ennemi qui a infligé des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à Nazrakhei.
languages.original_text: Nazrakhei grants his ally (allies with obey my authority have highest priority) an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}. The creature which gained that extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} tries to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the enemy who {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} Nazrakhei.

traits.locale_text: Nazrakhei confère un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} à son allié (les alliés sous l'effet d'Obéissez-Moi ! sont prioritaires). La créature ayant bénéficié de ce {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} supplémentaire essaie de {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}toucher{/g} l'ennemi qui a infligé des dégâts à Nazrakhei.

languages.text: Nazrakhei gewährt seinem Verbündeten einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} (mit "Gehorche meinem Befehl!" belegte Verbündete haben die höchste Priorität). Die Kreatur, die diesen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zusatzzug{/g} erhalten hat, versucht den Feind zu {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}treffen{/g}, der Nazrakhei {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zugefügt hat.
languages.original_text: Nazrakhei grants his ally (allies with obey my authority have highest priority) an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}. The creature which gained that extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} tries to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the enemy who {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} Nazrakhei.

traits.locale_text: Nazrakhei gewährt seinem Verbündeten einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatz-Zug{/g} (Verbündete mit Gehorche meinem Befehl! haben die höchste Priorität). Die Kreatur, die diesen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zusatz-Zug{/g} erhalten hat, versucht den Feind zu {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}treffen{/g}, der Nazrakhei Schaden zugefügt hat.

languages.text: ナズラクヘイは彼の味方(私の権威に従えで味方になった者は優先順位が高い）に{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を付与する。追加{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を獲得した生物は、ナズラクヘイに{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えた敵への{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}を試みる。
languages.original_text: Nazrakhei grants his ally (allies with obey my authority have highest priority) an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}. The creature which gained that extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} tries to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the enemy who {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} Nazrakhei.

traits.locale_text: ナズラクヘイは彼の味方(私の権威に従えで味方になった者は優先順位が高い）に{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を付与する。追加{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を獲得した生物は、ナズラクヘイにダメージを与えた敵への{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}攻撃{/g}を試みる。

languages.text: Nazrakhei, dost birimine (otoriteme itaat et kabiliyetinin etkisi altındaki dost birimler yüksek önceliklidir) bir {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazandırır. Ek {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} kazanan yaratık, Nazrakhei'e {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} veren düşmana {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurur{/g}.
